column1: #Text=Aang says : " I laugh at gravity all the time .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sorry ... " Storyteller says : " Aww , cheapskates !
#Text=" Storyteller says : " Tell it to the cap , boy .
#Text=" Storyteller says : " Aww , much obliged , little bat - thing .
#Text=" Aang says : " It means a lot to hear airbender stories .
#Text=It must have been a hundred years ago your great grandpa met them .
#Text=" Storyteller says : " What are you prattling about , child ?
#Text=Great Grandpappy saw the air walkers last week .
